short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Disables all selection on the site to disable copying

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Disable text selection on defined URLs. The "blacklisted" URLs can be defined within the popup and the popup will be pin code protected during the initial setup.
